targets.rawSql: SELECT ip_proto, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) AND ( tag = 0 ) GROUP BY ip_proto
SELECT sum(bytes) as IPv4 FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) AND ( family = 4 )
SELECT sum(bytes) as IPv6 FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) AND ( family = 6 )
SELECT label, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) GROUP BY label
SELECT sum(bytes) as Inbound FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) AND ( tag = 0 )
SELECT sum(bytes) as Outbound FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) AND ( tag = 1 )
SELECT ip_proto, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) AND ( tag = 1 ) GROUP BY ip_proto
SELECT as_src_name, as_src, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( tag = 0 ) AND ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) GROUP BY as_src_name, as_src
SELECT ip_src, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( tag = 1 ) AND ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) GROUP BY ip_src
SELECT ip_dst, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( tag = 1 ) AND ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) GROUP BY ip_dst
SELECT as_dst, as_dst_name, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( tag = 1 ) AND ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) GROUP BY as_dst, as_dst_name

SELECT ip_src, ip_dst, as_src_name, as_src, as_dst, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( tag = 0 ) AND ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) GROUP BY ip_src, ip_dst, as_src_name, as_src, as_dst

SELECT ip_src, ip_dst, as_dst_name, as_src, as_dst, sum(bytes) FROM "dankflows"."sflow" WHERE ( tag = 1 ) AND ( stamp_inserted >= $__fromTime AND stamp_inserted <= $__toTime ) GROUP BY ip_src, ip_dst, as_dst_name, as_src, as_dst

title: sFlow/Netflow Analytics
description: Flow Analytics with pmacct and ClickHouse
